column6: The New Captain America comes face-to-face with an old ally -- Prince Namor -- on a dangerous trip to China. Can Bucky and Namor team up to save the memory of an old comrade-in-arms as Cold War crimes come back to haunt the Winter Soldier?
column8: | writer:Ed Brubaker | letterer:Joe Caramagna | colorist:Frank D'Armata | other:Chris Eliopoulos | other:Steve Epting
